name: HotelsCombined.com
tag_list: hotels, hotel-comparison-services, travel, lodging, accommodation, metasearch
overview:
HotelsCombined.com is a hotel search engine head quartered in Sydney Australia. Founded in 2005 by a team of technology and digital business experts, HotelsCombined allows travellers to search for hotels in over 120,000 destinations worldwide. Visited by over 100 million people every year, the service is available in 24 languages and supports 120 currencies.

Travellers are able to instantly search and compare room availability and prices from 100’s of travel websites at once, including Expedia, Hotels.com, Booking.com, Agoda (and many more) all in one set of search results. The service is free, with all prices seen on HotelsCombined inclusive of all associated taxes. Once you decide on the hotel deal, you’re able to click directly through to partner websites to book.

A world leading hotel comparison company, HotelsCombined won TRAVELtech ‘Website of the Year’ in 2010. The company’s strong growth saw it named one of the fastest growing technology companies in Australia and Asia Pacific in 2010 and 2011 by consulting group Deloitte.

HotelsCombined also operates an affiliate program which allows sites to seamlessly integrate the HotelsCombined hotel comparison solution into their site. The program provides an extensive range of integration tools, a generous commission model and a variety of reporting. For more information visit: http://www.hotelscombined.com/Affiliates.aspx
